directions.step:
From: beatbr00 <beatbr00@dons.ac.usfca.EDU>
Date: 31 May 1995 05:39:44 -0600
Mix all ingredients with your hands until soft. Flatten 1 inch balls of dough on an ungreased cookie sheet. Press flat with bottom of drinking glass dipped in granulated sugar. Bake in 350 degree oven about 10 minutes. Makes 4 dozen.
